title: Does anyone know when Riot will support 4k gaming?
body: So I bought the best 4k monitor on the market the acer predator 32" 4K UHD IPS, G-Sync, can't play on 4K because everything is so small, downgraded to 2k on league and my cursor is still small, anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
1. Plug in your monitor
2. If you are using windows, right click and go too properties, lower your resolution to 1366x786 or whatever it is.
3. Launch league
4. change res to the same as your background on the ingame video tab

Scale hud size?
Or increase the res to max you possibly can
apparently i had to use my HDMI instead of my display port like why? :O i really have to downgrade on a 4k monitor

Why not just use HDMI in the first place. Hdmi gives you a decent res, and is easy to modify, with a decent video and signal, display gives you something under 4k but over 3, and is still touchy to use.
